title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 ‚Äì Trailer Has Been Released Plus 3 Posters
description: Paramount has released a second official trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and three new posters. The film will be released on December 20, 2024.
author: Kaitlyn Booth
excerpt: Now that the official numbers for Gladiator II have rolled in, maybe Paramount Pictures won't have to rely entirely on Sonic the Hedgehog 3 to keep the lights on until 2025. Either way, the film remains likely the biggest "sure thing" of all of the December releases. The first two films are perfect examples of everything that you can [‚Ä¶]
text: Posted in: Movies, Paramount Pictures | Tagged: sonic the hedgehog 3Paramount has released a second official trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and three new posters. The film will be released on December 20, 2024.Article Summary Paramount unveils a new Sonic the Hedgehog 3 trailer and three fresh posters, teasing an action-packed film. Sonic fans can rejoice as Shadow the Hedgehog joins the fray, voiced by none other than Keanu Reeves. The trailer hints at an intense showdown, featuring Shadow with a gun, promising to up the stakes. Get ready for another riveting adventure with Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails hitting cinemas December 20, 2024. Now that the official numbers for¬†Gladiator II¬†have rolled in, maybe Paramount Pictures won't have to rely entirely on¬†Sonic the Hedgehog 3 to keep the lights on until 2025.¬†Either way, the film remains likely the biggest "sure thing" of all of the December releases. The first two films are perfect examples of everything that you can do right to keep fans happy and when they teased Shadow at the end of the second film, people lost their collective minds. Now Shadow is not only showing up looking game-accurate, he's being voiced by Keanu Reeves,¬†so Sonic fans can stay winning. Paramount has released a second official trailer today, but if you're a fan who is going to check this movie out regardless, you might want to skip this one. There is a ton of new footage and it feels like this one gives away a lot more of the plot compared to the others. Then again, this trailer features Shadow holding a gun, and that might be enough for you to bypass any worries about spoilers. We also got some new posters, including some for ScreenX and 4DX. Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Summary, Cast List, Release Date Sonic the Hedgehog returns to the big screen this holiday season in his most thrilling adventure yet. Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet. Director Jeff Fowler returns along with our all-star cast, including Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, Idris Elba, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Natasha Rothwell, Shemar Moore, Adam Pally, Lee Majdoub, newcomers Alyla Browne and Krysten Ritter, with Keanu Reeves joining the franchise as Shadow the Hedgehog.¬†Sonic the Hedgehog 3 will be released on December 20, 2024. html:
Posted in: Movies, Paramount Pictures | Tagged: sonic the hedgehog 3

Paramount has released a second official trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and three new posters. The film will be released on December 20, 2024.

Article Summary

  • Paramount unveils a new Sonic the Hedgehog 3 trailer and three fresh posters, teasing an action-packed film.
  • Sonic fans can rejoice as Shadow the Hedgehog joins the fray, voiced by none other than Keanu Reeves.
  • The trailer hints at an intense showdown, featuring Shadow with a gun, promising to up the stakes.
  • Get ready for another riveting adventure with Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails hitting cinemas December 20, 2024.

Now that the official numbers for¬†Gladiator II¬†have rolled in, maybe Paramount Pictures won't have to rely entirely on¬†Sonic the Hedgehog 3 to keep the lights on until 2025.¬†Either way, the film remains likely the biggest "sure thing" of all of the December releases. The first two films are perfect examples of everything that you can do right to keep fans happy and when they teased Shadow at the end of the second film, people lost their collective minds. Now Shadow is not only showing up looking game-accurate, he's being voiced by Keanu Reeves,¬†so Sonic fans can stay winning. Paramount has released a second official trailer today, but if you're a fan who is going to check this movie out regardless, you might want to skip this one. There is a ton of new footage and it feels like this one gives away a lot more of the plot compared to the others. Then again, this trailer features Shadow holding a gun, and that might be enough for you to bypass any worries about spoilers. We also got some new posters, including some for ScreenX and 4DX.

Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Summary, Cast List, Release Date

Sonic the Hedgehog returns to the big screen this holiday season in his most thrilling adventure yet. Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.

Director Jeff Fowler returns along with our all-star cast, including Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, Idris Elba, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Natasha Rothwell, Shemar Moore, Adam Pally, Lee Majdoub, newcomers Alyla Browne and Krysten Ritter, with Keanu Reeves joining the franchise as Shadow the Hedgehog.¬†Sonic the Hedgehog 3 will be released on December 20, 2024.

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

About Kaitlyn Booth

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.

Latest by Kaitlyn Booth

Sonic the Hedgehog 3 ‚Äì Trailer Has Been Released Plus 3 Posters

Paramount has released a second official trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and three new posters. The film will be released on December 20, 2024.

Charlize Theron Has Joined The Cast Of Christopher Nolan's New Film

Charlize Theron is the latest star to join the impressive ensemble cast of director Christopher Nolan's new film set to be distributed by Universal.

Nosferatu Tickets Go On Sale With A Fun Fandango Easter Egg, A Poster

Tickets for Robert Eggers's new film, Nosferatu, are officially on sale. There is a cute little easter egg on Fandango, and we also got another poster.

Kraven the Hunter Snags A Mainland China Release Date, 9 New HQ Images

Kraven the Hunter has snagged a mainland China release date. Sony Pictures has also released two new behind-the-scenes images and 7 HQ images.

Nosferatu: New TV Spot And An IMAX Poster, Tickets On Sale Tomorrow

Tickets for Nosferatu go on sale tomorrow, and Focus has released a new TV spot and a fantastic-looking IMAX poster.

Robert Pattinson Has Joined The Cast Of Christopher Nolan's New Film

Robert Pattinson is the latest to reportedly join the cast of Christopher Nolan's new mysterious film, which will be released on July 17, 2026.
